testDrivenDevelopment

Interface CustomerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerServiceImplementation

    public interface CustomerService
    Defined interface to state the method that the customer service interface has to support.
    Author:
    Rob

    • Method Detail

      • createNewCustomer

        Customer createNewCustomer(Customer customer)
        An interface to return a basic customer
        Parameters:
        customer - - the new customer who has been created and passed to the service
        Returns:
        the created customer

      • updateCustomer

        Customer updateCustomer(Customer customer)
        An interface to update a customer
        Parameters:
        customer - - create a new customer at the interface
        Returns:
        the updated customer

      • removeCustomer

        boolean removeCustomer(Customer customer)
        A method to delete a customer
        Parameters:
        customer - - the customer being deleted
        Returns:
        a boolean to indicate the customer has been deleted

      • listAllTransactions

        java.util.List<Transaction> listAllTransactions(Customer customer)
        A way to list the transactions against a customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - - the customer that we want to delete.
        Returns:
        - return a list of the transactions for that customer.
